title: Renders the app deployment kubernetes manifests

body.renderedTemplate:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ServiceAccount
metadata:
  name: sa-appdeployment1-default
  namespace: default
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: appdeployment1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: appdeployment1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: appdeployment1
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: sa-appdeployment1-default
      containers:
      - name: app
        image: mcr.microsoft.com/app:v1
        command: ["/app"]
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: svc-appdeployment1-default
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    app: appdeployment1
  ports:
  - port: 80
    targetPort: 8080
